outboundReferences.contextLine: In the [[shared-responsibility-model]], IaaS places the largest share of responsibility with the client.

inboundReferences.contextLine: - [[iaas]] places most of the responsibility on the consumer; the cloud vendor is only responsible for physical security and connectivity;
Azure DevTest Labs is a tool to create and manage [[iaas]] (like [[azure-virtual-machines]]) and [[paas]] (like [[azure-app-service]]) instances for dev and test environments.
